00020 /*****************************************************************************
00021 
00022   sc_status.h -- Definition of the simulation phases
00023 
00024   Original Author: Philipp A. Hartmann, OFFIS, 2013-02-15
00025 
00026   CHANGE LOG AT THE END OF THE FILE
00027  *****************************************************************************/
00028 
00029 #ifndef SC_STATUS_H_INCLUDED_
00030 #define SC_STATUS_H_INCLUDED_
00031 
00032 #include <iosfwd>
00033 
00034 #include "sysc/kernel/sc_cmnhdr.h"
00035 
00036 namespace sc_core {
00037 
00038 // simulation status codes
00039 
00040 const int SC_SIM_OK        = 0;
00041 const int SC_SIM_ERROR     = 1;
00042 const int SC_SIM_USER_STOP = 2;
00043 
00044 enum sc_status
00045 {   // sc_get_status values:
00046     SC_UNITIALIZED=0x00,                 // initialize() not called yet
00047 
00048     SC_ELABORATION               = 0x01, // during module hierarchy construction
00049     SC_BEFORE_END_OF_ELABORATION = 0x02, // during before_end_of_elaboration()
00050     SC_END_OF_ELABORATION        = 0x04, // during end_of_elaboration()
00051     SC_START_OF_SIMULATION       = 0x08, // during start_of_simulation()
00052 
00053     SC_RUNNING                   = 0x10, // initialization, evaluation or update
00054     SC_PAUSED                    = 0x20, // when scheduler stopped by sc_pause()
00055     SC_STOPPED                   = 0x40, // when scheduler stopped by sc_stop()
00056     SC_END_OF_SIMULATION         = 0x80, // during end_of_simulation()
00057 
00058     // detailed simulation phases (for dynamic callbacks)
00059     SC_END_OF_INITIALIZATION     = 0x100, // after initialization
00060 //    SC_END_OF_EVALUATION         = 0x200, // between eval and update
00061     SC_END_OF_UPDATE             = 0x400, // after update/notify phase
00062     SC_BEFORE_TIMESTEP           = 0x800, // before next time step
00063 
00064     SC_STATUS_LAST               = SC_BEFORE_TIMESTEP,
00065     SC_STATUS_ANY                = 0xdff
00066 };
00067 
00068 // pretty-printing of sc_status values
00069 SC_API std::ostream& operator << ( std::ostream&, sc_status );
00070 
00071 } // namespace sc_core
00072

00080 
00081  *****************************************************************************/
00082 
00083 #endif /* SC_STATUS_H_INCLUDED_ */
